articles.title: Day 56 without sports 😭: An ode to the indefatigable Frank Gore, who could soon be playing alongside his son - USA TODAY
articles.description: Running back Frank Gore is returning for a 16th NFL season. His durability at one of football's hardest positions has made him a legend.
articles.content:
